info.name: Custom Anime Twist
info.description:
Anime Twist / twist.moe / AT available in 3 dark themes and a custom theme!

Custom: You choose background, accent and logo color!
True Black: OLED mode, black theme
R3: Modern Dark theme
GX: Gaming inspired Dark theme
Pure Light: A soft light mode

Features:
A nice clean design
Custom background image
Custom colors for just about everything
4 preset themes to choose from
Overall a better anime watching experience
Mobile support

Images:
https://imgur.com/a/h3QijYA

NOTE: 
Custom image may break sometimes, simply uninstall and reinstall style.

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

DISCORD:
Join my Discord server to get notifications when a new update has been released, get direct support from me and others, and it is generally faster than userstyles to get in touch with me : https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui
info.additionalInfo:
V3.9: RGB mode, improvements to ATP
V3.8: Anime Twist Premium extension support
V3.7: marked text now matches accent color
V3.6.2: fix
V3.6.1: improvements
V3.6: Vibrant Video for brighter and better video, chat improvements
V3.5.1: tweak
V3.5: experimental design changes, wallpaper implementation improvements, fixes
V3.4.1: chat improvements for light and dark custom theme
V3.4: added Luminous Blue theme
V3.3: Pure Light preset theme added
V3.2: Custom Light modes now supported
V3.1: "MOD" tag is now themeable and also correctly themed.
V3: Background color, Accent color, Text color and Logo color is now custom!
V2.1: improvements
V2: added custom images
V1: Release
